content:
Krista measured the height and petal length (in centimeters) of all the flowers in her garden.  

**Plot the data in a scatter plot.**  
  
|||||||
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: 
**Height $(\text{cm})$** | $32.5$ | $15$ | $7.5$ | $27.5$ | $15$ | $32.5$ 
**Petal length $(\text{cm})$**| $6.5$ | $4.5$ | $7$ | $9$ | $5.5$ | $3$
